author: Ronnaporn Kanivichaporn
description: Ronnaporn's inspiration: "Pink Me Up was born out of the lack of 'pick me up' cocktails in the rum category; unlike vodka's Bloody Mary, or gin's Corpse Reviver No.2 nothing stood out for rum. By combining BACARD√ç Cart Blanca rum, fresh tomato and Thai sweet basil, I wanted to create a surprisingly refreshing and balanced cocktail that would cheer up anyone's day."
name: Pink Me Up

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE tomato in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
